questions.question: How do I check if a user has premium access?
questions.answer: Call `await addOnUISdk.app.currentUser.isPremiumUser()` to check premium user status.

questions.question: How do I check if a page contains premium content?
How do I handle premium upgrade flow?
questions.answer: Call `await addOnUISdk.app.startPremiumUpgradeIfFreeUser()` instead of redirecting to pricing page.

questions.question: How do I allow preview-only of premium content?
questions.answer: Use `RenditionIntent.preview` and add `"renditionPreview": true` to manifest requirements.

questions.question: What error indicates premium content restriction?
How should I prevent preview downloads?
questions.answer: Reject `contextmenu` and `dragstart` events, or use CSS background-image instead of img tags.

questions.question: Should I still use try/catch for premium errors?
questions.answer: Check user status and page content first; use try/catch only as fallback for edge cases.

questions.question: What are good UI patterns for premium content?
questions.answer: Disable export buttons, show upgrade buttons, add tooltips, or display premium content indicators.
